attributes.action: Immediatly change the Olympic logo and ask the people to design a better one
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The new Logo is crass and unreprestative. If this is to be the peoples olympics the current logo should be rejected and the people asked to create a new one in a national competition.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
